SpikeCV

I'm leading SpikeCV, an open-source project designed for the emerging field of spike camera vision. It brings together spiking datasets, reusable algorithms, and hardware interfaces — everything you need to explore fast, brain-inspired vision. The goal is to build a community around spike-based computing and help researchers get from simulation to real-world deployment.

Thanks to the main colloborators! Jiyuan Zhang, Rui Zhao, Jianhao Ding, Shiyan Chen, Weijian Wu and Tiejun Huang. 💛

We’d love to have you on board if you’re interested — feel free to reach out and join us! ✨

Grants

I am currently the principal investigator (PI) of the following projects and fellowships:

  • 📌 The National Natural Science Foundation (NSFC) of China for Young Scientists
  • 🎯 The 9th China Association for Science and Technology Youth Talent Support Project
  • 🏙️ Beijing Natural Science Foundation (General Program)
  • 💡 China Postdoctoral Science Foundation (Special Funding)
  • 🎓 Peking University Boya Postdoctoral Fellowship
  • 🌐 The Zhejiang Lab's International Talent Fund
